Posts.Content: Hi -  I too am on 3 lots FEC and 3 lots Tax....  I am on 3rd FEC on Monday and apart from being/feeling sick and furry tongue, no taste I SEEM to be ok.  Can you tell me a bit about how you were affected by the next 3 as I am really worried as people keep talking about how it's much stronger than FEC and fatigue, losing nails, etc.  Can you shed any light on it please.  Thanks.
Posts.Title: help 3RD fec

Posts.Content: Thanks.  It all seems smoke and mirrors to me - the oncologists like to keep things to themselves and only tell you on a need to know basis.   Kathyb2
Posts.Title: Does anyone understand blood test results?

Posts.Content: I am about to embark on 4th chemo and am interested to understand the 4 blood test results in my treatment record book.  What levels are ok for chemo and when are they too low?  Talking about Hb, WBC, Plts and Neuts.  Have googled loads of stuff but nothing come up.  Any ideas gratefully received. Kathyb2
Posts.Title: Does anyone understand blood test results?
